welcome_title: Hi {{ name }}, we love having you here!
welcome_subject: Platoniq welcomes you to the Wilder Journal
welcome_teaser: Fuga facere natus nemo. Culpa quo minima sunt beatae sunt quaerat in.
welcome_content_1: This Journal that you have “in your hands” is the way we have at Fundación Platoniq to open the door(s) to our world(s) to you. Here you will find in-depth articles (deep dives), interviews and other content along our lines of activity (Future Culture, Democratic Innovation, Citizen Empowerment, Social and Solidary Economy, and Cooperativism).
welcome_content_2: The theme of this Journal will be especially focused on the participation and influence of citizens in public decisions or in their own organizations. It also serves as a platform for initiatives of this type to become known and be investigated.
contact_user_title: Hi {{ name }}, we got your message
contact_user_content_1: Thanks for getting in touch! We're always thrilled to answer your questions, take care of our relationships and sow new alliances.
contact_user_content_2: You sent us the message below:
contact_user_content_3: We'll soon get back to you. Until then... we hope you enjoy the wait!
contact_admin_subject: [Wilder Journal] {{ name }} sent us a message
contact_admin_content_1: Hi! We've been sent a message through the contact form in Wilder Journal.
contact_admin_content_2: The content of the message is:
contact_admin_content_3: You can easily answer to the message by clicking the link below:
